tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trial_participants (
  participant_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
                  age INT,
                  gender VARCHAR(10),
                  condition VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE medications (medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
                  dosage VARCHAR(20),
                  frequency VARCHAR(20),
                  participant_id INT,
                  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id));

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  gender TEXT,
  age INT,
  date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Trials (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  drug_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Visits (
  visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
  trial_id UUID REFERENCES Trials(trial_id),
  visit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TestResults (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id UUID REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
  trial_id UUID REFERENCES Trials(trial_id),
  test_name TEXT,
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
	participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	study_group VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
	medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	medication_name VARCHAR(100),
	effectiveness_score FLOAT,
	side_effects VARCHAR(200),
	usage_instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	participant_id INT,
	appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
	appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
	completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE study_sites (
	site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	site_name VARCHAR(100),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	lead_researcher VARCHAR(50),
	contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
	result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	participant_id INT,
	test_date TIMESTAMP,
	test_type VARCHAR(50),
	result_details JSON
);
